dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: Look, you can tell Catherine the new shipment'll be ready when it's ready, all right? She's welcome to come up here and pack boxes herself if she's in such a hurry.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Take it easy. I'm just looking around.

dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: Well, if you're that friendly about it, then you definitely aren't one of Catherine's SubLight toughs. My mistake.

dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: Hope you can forgive my temper. This job's been running me ragged lately.

dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: First my auto loader foreman stages a walkout, and now my chief pescatological health manager is missing.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Let's talk about Caleb.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I don't have time for this.

dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: Unless you're here to tell me he's agreed to do his job again, I've got nothing to say.

dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: If Caleb wants to keep this job, he'd better get back to it. I'm about ready to hire SubLight contractors at this rate.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Why can't you give him his pay increase?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: They're hard workers, aren't they? Don't they deserve some compensation for that?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Are you willing to meet Caleb halfway?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Let's talk about something else.

dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: For running me ragged while he takes an extended leave at the bar? Not on your life.

dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: Fine by me.

dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: Something else on your mind?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll talk to you later.

dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: I don't have the bits for it. Plain and simple.

dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: Besides, if I make an exception for him, I gotta do the same for everyone.

dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: Hard workers? They turn dials and flip switches. The machines do all the actual work.

dialog.speaker: velmaballard (Female)
dialog.utterance: Caleb and his crew have it better than anyone else around here, I'll tell you that much.
